io.github.kensuke1984.kibrary.util

クラス Trace

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.kensuke1984.kibrary.util.Trace

  • public class Trace
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility for a function y = f(x)

    This class is IMMUTABLE

      peak is defined as 0 < (y(x[i])-y(x[i-1]))*(y(x[i])-y(x[i+1]))

    • コンストラクタの詳細

      • Trace

        public Trace(double[] x,
             double[] y)
        Deep copy
        パラメータ:
        x - array for X
        y - array for Y

    • メソッドの詳細

      • createTrace

        public static Trace createTrace(java.nio.file.Path path,
                                int xColumn,
                                int yColumn)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        All lines are trimmed. Lines starting with 'c' '!' '#' are ignored.
        パラメータ:
        path - of the file you want to read
        xColumn - indicates which column is x (for the first column → 0)
        yColumn - indicates which column is y
        戻り値:
        Trace made by the file of the path
        例外:
        java.io.IOException - if any

      • createTrace

        public static Trace createTrace(java.nio.file.Path path)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        パラメータ:
        path - of a file
        戻り値:
        Trace of x in the first column and y in the second column
        例外:
        java.io.IOException - if any

      • findBestShift

        public static int findBestShift(double[] base,
                                double[] compare)
        最も相関の高い位置を探す 探し方は、短い方をずらしていく 同じ長さだと探さない。
        パラメータ:
        base - array
        compare - array
        戻り値:
        compareを何ポイントずらすか 0だと先頭から

      • getXAt

        public double getXAt(int i)
        パラメータ:
        i - index for x [0, length -1]
        戻り値:
        x[i]

      • getYAt

        public double getYAt(int i)
        パラメータ:
        i - index for y [0, length -1]
        戻り値:
        y[i]

      • getLength

        public int getLength()
        戻り値:
        the number of elements

      • toPolynomial

        public org.apache.commons.math3.analysis.polynomials.PolynomialFunction toPolynomial(int n)
        compute n th polynomial functions for the trace
        パラメータ:
        n - degree of polynomial
        戻り値:
        n th PolynomialFunction fitted to this

      • shiftX

        public Trace shiftX(double shift)
        f(x) → f(x-shift) Shifts "shift" in the direction of x axis. If you want to change like below:
        x:(3, 4, 5) → (0, 1, 2)
        f(3) → f'(0) then the value 'shift' should be -3
        パラメータ:
        shift - value of shift
        戻り値:
        f (x - shift), the values in y are deep copied.

      • toValue

        public double toValue(int n,
                      double c)
        x=cの点でのyの値をfをn次関数として補完する 補完の際には直近のn+1点で補完 f(x) = Σ ai xi
        パラメータ:
        n - degree of function for interpolation
        c - point for the value
        戻り値:
        y = f(c) = Σ ai ci

      • getNearestX

        public double getNearestX(double target)
        パラメータ:
        target - value of x to look for the nearest x value to
        戻り値:
        the closest x to the target

      • indexOfPeaks

        public int[] indexOfPeaks()
        peak is defined as 0 < (y(x[i])-y(x[i-1]))*(y(x[i])-y(x[i+1]))
        戻り値:
        index of a peak (ordered)

      • indexOfDownwardConvex

        public int[] indexOfDownwardConvex()
        0 < (y(x[i])-y(x[i-1])) * (y(x[i]) - y(x[i+1])) and y[i] < y[i-1]
        戻り値:
        index of downward convex

      • indexOfUpwardConvex

        public int[] indexOfUpwardConvex()
        0 < (y(x[i])-y(x[i-1]))*(y(x[i])-y(x[i+1])) and y[i-1] < t[i]
        戻り値:
        index of downward convex

      • getNearestXIndex

        public int getNearestXIndex(double target)
        パラメータ:
        target - value of x to look for the nearest x value to
        戻り値:
        the index of the closest x to the target

      • findBestShift

        public double findBestShift(Trace trace)
        Assume the interval of x is same as that of this.
        パラメータ:
        trace - which length must be shorter than this.
        戻り値:
        the shift value x0 in x direction for best correlation.

      • cutWindow

        public Trace cutWindow(double start,
                       double end)
        thisの start ≤ x ≤ endの部分を切り抜く
        パラメータ:
        start - start x of window
        end - end x of window
        戻り値:
        対象部分のtraceを返す (deep copy)

      • cutWindow

        public Trace cutWindow(Timewindow timeWindow)
        パラメータ:
        timeWindow - Timewindow for cut
        戻り値:
        timeWindowの内部に属する部分を切り取ったものをnewして返す

      • getX

        public double[] getX()
        戻り値:
        DEEP copy of x

      • getY

        public double[] getY()
        戻り値:
        DEEP copy of y

      • getXforMaxValue

        public double getXforMaxValue()
        戻り値:
        x which gives maximum y

      • getXforMinValue

        public double getXforMinValue()
        戻り値:
        x which gives minimum y

      • getMaxValue

        public double getMaxValue()
        戻り値:
        maximum value of y

      • getMinValue

        public double getMinValue()
        戻り値:
        minimum value of y

      • getXVector

        public org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector getXVector()
        戻り値:
        (deep) copy of x

      • getYVector

        public org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector getYVector()
        戻り値:
        (deep) copy of y

      • add

        public Trace add(Trace trace)
        x in this and trace must be same. i.e. all the x elements must be same
        パラメータ:
        trace - to be added
        戻り値:
        new Trace after the addition

      • multiply

        public Trace multiply(double d)
        パラメータ:
        d - to be multiplied
        戻り値:
        Trace which y is multiplied d

      • average

        public double average()
        戻り値:
        the average value of y

      • standardDeviation

        public double standardDeviation()
        1/n×Σ(yi - ymean)2
        戻り値:
        standard deviation of y

      • write

        public void write(java.nio.file.Path path,
                  java.nio.file.OpenOption... options)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Writes X and Y. Each line has Xi and Yi
        パラメータ:
        path - of the write file
        options - if any
        例外:
        java.io.IOException - if any
